      • scanFile

        ScanInfo scanFile(File fileToScan)
                  throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                         UnauthorizedAccessException,
                         Exception
        Scan a given file on the file system
        Parameters:
        fileToScan - : the file object to be scanned
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        Exception

      • reScanFiles

        ScanInfo[] reScanFiles(String[] resources)
                       throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                              UnauthorizedAccessException,
                              InvalidArguentsException,
                              Exception
        Re-scan a given set of resources
        Parameters:
        resources - a set of md5/sha1/sha256 hashes. You can also specify a CSV list made up of a combination of any of the three allowed hashes (up to 25 items), this allows you to perform a batch request with one single call. Note that the file must already be present in our file store.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        InvalidArguentsException
        Exception

      • getScanReport

        FileScanReport getScanReport(String resource)
                             throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                    UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                    Exception
        Retrieve report for a scanned resource
        Parameters:
        resource - a md5/sha1/sha256 hash will retrieve the most recent report on a given sample. You may also specify a scan_id (sha256-timestamp as returned by the file upload API) to access a specific report. You can also specify a CSV list made up of a combination of hashes and scan_ids (up to 4 items with the standard request rate), this allows you to perform a batch request with one single call.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        Exception

      • getScanReports

        FileScanReport[] getScanReports(String[] resources)
                                throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                       UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                       Exception
        Retrieve reports for a set of scanned resource
        Parameters:
        resources - array of resources to get reports
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        Exception

      • scanUrls

        ScanInfo[] scanUrls(String[] urls)
                    throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                           UnauthorizedAccessException,
                           Exception
        scan a set of given URLs
        Parameters:
        urls - set of urls to be scanned, accepts a list of URLs (up to 4 with the standard request rate) so as to perform a batch scanning request with one single call. The URLs must be separated by a new line character.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        Exception

      • getUrlScanReport

        FileScanReport[] getUrlScanReport(String[] url,
                                boolean scan)
                                  throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                         UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                         Exception
        Retrieve reports for a given set of urls
        Parameters:
        url - set of urls, a URL will retrieve the most recent report on the given URL. You may also specify a scan_id (sha256-timestamp as returned by the URL submission API) to access a specific report. At the same time, you can specify a CSV list made up of a combination of hashes and scan_ids so as to perform a batch request with one single call (up to 4 resources per call with the standard request rate).
        scan - true if url s must be scanned before generating the report
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        Exception

      • getIPAddresReport

        IPAddressReport getIPAddresReport(String ipAddress)
                                  throws InvalidArguentsException,
                                         Exception
        Retrieve report for a given IP address
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - a valid IPv4 address in dotted quad notation, for the time being only IPv4 addresses are supported.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        InvalidArguentsException
        Exception

        DomainReport getDomainReport(String domain)
                             throws InvalidArguentsException,

                                    Exception

        Returns:

      • makeAComment

        GeneralResponse makeAComment(String resource,
                           String comment)
                             throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                    UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                    Exception
        Make a comment
        Parameters:
        resource - either a md5/sha1/sha256 hash of the file you want to review or the URL itself that you want to comment on.
        comment - the actual review, you can tag it using the "#" twitter-like syntax (e.g. #disinfection #zbot) and reference users using the "@" syntax (e.g. @VirusTotalTeam).
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        Exception
